publisher.value: Health and Social Care Information Centre

description.value: A vocabulary that identifies the assessment, discharge and withdrawal notice type.

requirements.value: This vocabulary contains values to be selected to set the notice type for a patient's referral.

display.value: Assessment Notice under the Care Act 2014 schedule 3
Assessment Notice Accept Response under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
Assessment Notice Reject Response under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
Discharge Notice under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
Discharge Notice Agreement under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
Discharge Notice Disagreement under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
Withdraw All Notices under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
Withdraw Discharge Notice Only under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
Withdraw Notice Accept under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
Withdraw Notice Reject under the Care Act 2014 Schedule 3
